attributes.review: I hate this app and this man with all my heart.  But I wanted to support our nation’s 💗orange Oompa Loompa💗 (no offense to Charlie and the Choclate Factory) and it’s garbage. It’s embarrassing how this toad could even allow for this app to be put on the Apple Store 🙈 doesn’t he like have world wars to start or something? I thought his daily agenda consisted of eating and hating on Democrat’s 🤧 Anyways chile, Stan Stray Kids for a good time. And get this Clown out of the office😳 #savebarrontrump

attributes.title: No, no dont show me this again
attributes.review: This app stinks, I took a shower today so its not me. Why make an app for the Orange and not Obama? the orange hasn't done anything good as a President, he didn’t even expect to win the election. it kept crashing after I got the app and also was lagging on games I don't want this to be here for glitchy phones. Please understand this and  I wish I could have rated it 0..😔✨

attributes.title: Abusing in Customer Service
attributes.review: Let’s start this off nicely I had to to wait 6 hours for this to download, to find out that it crashed. While I was shopping to find new Trump Apparel, I wondered if there were any discounts available, but when I went to the Customer service chat I got verbally abused by the workers, absolutely Terrible Decision downloading this app I will not be voting for Trump 2020.

attributes.title: Worst app in the App Store 😡
attributes.review: This app is trash it does not work it’s always glitching are the major problems do you not get this app i’ve been with my wife for five years she is my sixth wife and she agrees that I am an honest Christian man who believes in the word President Trump vice President pence says I mad!!! app has made me so upset because our president cannot live up to the expectations vote for trump 2020 unless you have a brain

attributes.title: App Took My Money
attributes.review: After I downloaded this app, which first of all it took about a week to download, the app took all of money money. It hacked my phone and went in my saving and took all of my money I am baffled by what trump and this app have done to me. I was already poor but now I’m poor and homeless so I’d like to have a personal apology by Trump thank h very much.🤬😡😤 you took everything from meeeeee😭😭

attributes.title: WORST APP EVERR
attributes.userName: yes i came from the tik tok
attributes.review: This has to be the worst app I’ve ever come across as soon as I downloaded it (which took 125 weeks) the app started playing music which made doodoo balls come flying all around my room and hit my sister in the face ounce we cleans up the mess my phone wouldn’t turn on and I had to get a new one which still had the app downloaded and when I deleted it a orange appeared on my bed

attributes.title: made me get kidnapped
attributes.review: this app is literally hell. First it took 3 business days to download. Then, it wiped out all the photos on my phone and ruined everything. I cant back up anything anymore. And my instagram wont open. Then, 3 people dressed in animal masks busted down my door and took me away. Im writing this from the basement they are keeping me in.. so i cant give it higher than one star ❤️😤✨

attributes.title: MY PHONE BROKE!!!!
attributes.review: i downloaded this app because i wanted to keep up with the campaign of our beloved president 😻💕😻😔😔💕👈🧚‍♂️🤘🏻🤘🏻🤘🏻but it took hour to download and when it finally, i tried to open it, but my phone crashed and froze? it wouldn’t restart for hours and by the time it restarted it was running so much slower 😤😤😤😤😤😡😡😡 this app is disgusting and awful do NOT download it

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: I wanted to get this app to support my amazing President but for some reason it took months and months to full download, and when it did end up downloading, my storage was completely full bc the app had imported pics of mr Trump, then it completely wiped my phone and turn my lock screen and home screen background to a picture of Donald Trump, love the president but hate this app

attributes.title: ABSOLUTE TRASH
attributes.review:
I downloaded this app with low expectations from the start but i was not expecting it to be THAT BAD honestly. I first excepted to have the app send me notifications and only 15 minutes into having the app I started getting notifications saying that if I don’t put up a trump flag they will go and kill Pikachu and SpongeBob. so obviously with my bright mind I deleted the app and I wrote this review. 

sincerely- ya fav
